page.title: 19Local News
page.content: The new road scheme at{Fforestfach}is designed to ease traffic congestion. For many years now the cross roads has been a notorious blackspot for motorists.Over the past few months the council has been working to make {Carmarthen Road}into a dual carriageway .Sadly, 17 houses had to be knocked down to do this.However, these houses were very old and shabby and the residents have been given new homes. We surveyed our parents to find out their views.We asked whether they were for or against the scheme.The results of the survey are as follows 68%{For,}26%{Against}and 6%{Did'nt {know.}Those for the scheme said it would ease the traffic and those against said that it would make crossing the road more difficult and therefore split the village in two.
